Rewards Rate: 5 Travel Points/₹100 Spent on Travel and 2 Travel Points/₹100 Spent on All Other Eligible Spends
Reward Redemption: Travel Points Can Be Redeemed for Various Products, Vouchers, and More. 1 Travel Point = ₹0.25
Travel: Zero Forex Charges on International Spends
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Complimentary Lounge Access Each Quarter (8 Each Year) on Spends of ₹35,000 or More in the Previous Quarter
International Lounge Access: Two Free Visits Each Calendar Year
Golf: 4 Complimentary Rounds of Green Fee in a Year and One Golf Lesson Each Month (Only for Mastercard Variant)
Insurance Benefits: Travel insurance provides cover worth USD 50,000 to an individual on his international travels.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: A 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawal amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500

product_details: Welcome gift voucher worth Rs. 3,000 from MakeMyTrip
Up to 5 travel points on every spend of Rs. 100.
Up to 25,000 bonus travel points every year on achieving the milestone spend.
Additional Taj Experience Gift Card worth Rs. 10,000 on annual spending of Rs. 7.5 lacs.
Complimentary domestic and international lounge access.
Complimentary membership to the Priority Pass program.
Complimentary access to golf sessions at selected golf courses across the country.
